quote: You're so beautiful. I can't believe you're almost mine.
author: Debra White Smith,  First Impressions

quote: You are beautiful. Your beauty, just like your capacity for life, happiness, and success, is immeasurable.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The need in me beautiful is to look back on you forever!!
author: Abhijeet Sawant

quote: Oh my love! Your eyes are the mirror of my heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: … and the most beautiful words ever spoken, I have not yet said to you.
author: Nâzım Hikmet

quote: When you write from the heart, it is always beautiful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are the prettiest flower in the garden of my love. As the moon longs for the night, my heart longs for your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is beautiful to express love and even more beautiful to feel it.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: To see the beauty, love
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love comforteth like sunshine after rain.
author: William Shakespeare,  The Complete Sonnets and Poems

quote: You are the beloved conscious reflection of this universe. You are here to enjoy the beauty and joy of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are the love, the lover, and the beloved.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: YOU are your love of a lifetime.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Your beauty took my breath away, but your mind has stopped my heart.
author: Ivan Rusilko,  Appetizers

quote: Love what is simple and beautiful. These are the essentials.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson,  The Tao of Emerson the Tao of Emerson

quote: What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful.
author: Scott Westerfeld,  Uglies

quote: So many things become beautiful when you really look.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Before I Fall

quote: Your real beauty is hidden in your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Breathtaking, splendid, wondrous, sublime, all those words describe you, exactly as you are. You are a work of art! Enjoy your beauty!
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Thank you...for gracing my life with your lovely presence, for adding the sweet measure of your soul to my existence.
author: Richard Matheson,  What Dreams May Come

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever.
author: John Keats,  Endymion: A Poetic Romance

quote: Bring love and peace and happiness and beautiful lives into the world in my honor. Thank you. Love you.
author: Aron Ralston

quote: There is nothing on earth more beautiful to me than your smile...no sound sweeter than your laughter...no pleasure greater than holding you in my arms. I realized today that I could never live without you, stubborn little hellion that you are. In this life and the next, you’re my only hope of happiness. Tell me, Lillian, dearest love...how can you have reached so far inside my heart?
author: Lisa Kleypas,  It Happened One Autumn

quote: Through my love for you, I want to express my love for the whole cosmos, the whole of humanity, and all beings. By living with you, I want to learn to love everyone and all species. If I succeed in loving you, I will be able to love everyone and all species on Earth... This is the real message of love.
author: Hanh Nhat Thich,  Teachings on Love

quote: Ben kissed me like he could kiss me forever, like he had to kiss me forever and he wanted to, he wanted me, and when he felt my surprise at that, I could feel again how beautiful I was to him, how I was beautiful beyond words.
author: Ivy Devlin,  Low Red Moon

quote: I Am In Love With Myself, With My Heart.
author: Nirav Sanchaniya

quote: Beauty is the illumination of your soul.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: You have every right to a beautiful life.
author: Selena Gómez

quote: You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
author: Amy Bloom

quote: You naked in my bed is even more unbelievably beautiful than I thought it would be... and trust me I've thought about it. A lot.
author: Abbi Glines,  Fallen Too Far

quote: No sooner have you feasted on beauty with your eyes than your mind tells you that beauty is vain and beauty passes
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Beauty is a heart with wings.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: I am intrigued by the smile upon your face, and the sadness within your eyes
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: I need you because I know I deserve you but let me fall in love with you one last time before I let go. So I can remember the beautiful imperfection that rattled my bones.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: A beautiful bright blue sky; up above so high; how happy i am; to feel fully satisfied.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
author: Donald Cargill

quote: I am tired, Beloved, of chafing my heart againstThe want of you;Of squeezing it into little inkdrops,And posting it.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: The beauty of the stars, moon, and oceans are a reflection of my heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything, no matter how beautiful, is only with us for awhile.
author: Geoff Ryman

quote: The sunset faded and blended from pink to peach to mango in a smoothie in the sky. For as long as she doesn’t love me, I will love her.
author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..

quote: Do I love you because you're beautiful, or are you beautiful because I love you?
author: Richard Rodgers,  Rodgers & Hammerstein's Cinderella

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.
author: Rumi

quote: Peace is always beautiful.
author: Walt Whitman,  Leaves of Grass

quote: Draw your pleasure, paint your pleasure, and express your pleasure strongly.
author: Pierre Bonnard

quote: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Beautiful face. Beautiful body. Horrible attitude. It was the holy trinity of hot boys.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian

quote: We are here to enjoy the breathtaking views of life with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Exuberance is beauty.
author: William Blake
